Name: Phantom: Twin Nova - Collapsar Blade
Desc: A mech developed by the Spacetrek Collective, which comes in melee and ranged variants. The two models fight gracefully in unison when paired.
DescOpen:
This enemy has a <color=HighlightB>higher RES</color> to <color=Thunder>Electro DMG </color>.

Twin Nova: Collapsar Blade sports a top-of-the-line Combat Synergy Module. Combined with Twin Nova: Nebulous Cannon, their battle synergy turns into a deadly dance of multi-pronged attacks

When Twin Nova: Collapsar Blade is hit by Tune Break, it takes 20% more total DMG for 30s, stacking up to 3 times. 

The Twin Nova mechs were built for exploration beyond the Stridergate. Collapsar Blade is the melee model. Their humanoid form embodies mankind's drive to explore the abyss when they look up at the stars.

Together as one, paired Twin Novas demonstrate unprecedented combat capabilities.
